description: The Virginia '''Sil'hooettes''' are a student-run, all-female identifying [[a cappella]] group at the [[University of Virginia]] in [[Charlottesville]], Virginia, United States. Once just the vision of four UVA students in the winter of 1988,{{Citation needed|date=December 2018}} the Sil'hooettes are now the most award-winning a cappella group at UVA.{{Citation needed|date=December 2018}} They have performed for thousands of people at  venues including the [[Kennedy Center]], [[The White House]], John Paul Jones Arena, [[Baltimore Orioles]] home baseball games, and [[Boston Red Sox]] home baseball games.
